snippet.title: An approach to precisely specifying the problem domain of design patterns
snippet.description:
* An approach to precisely specifying the problem domain of design patterns (Citations: 9)
Dae-kyoo Kim, Charbel El Khawand
The problem domain of a design pattern describes the problem context in which the pattern can be applied. In general, determining the applicability of a pattern to a particular problem heavily relies on the knowledge and experience the developer has with the pattern. This significantly limits the use of patterns. To address this issue, we propose an approach for rigorously ...
Journal: Journal of Visual Languages and Computing - VLC , vol. 18, no. 6, pp. 560-591, 2007
